name: Flagger
description:
Theme Interpretation:

The flag's behavior is out of control and so is the dev's control of it (we don't know what it will do next)

Description:

Flo is about to become the worlds greatest flag collector. After climbing to the top of Banner Mountain, she is seconds away from finishing her collection. What could possibly go wrong?

Gameplay:

  • The flag is out of control changing each time how it allows itself to be captured
  • Hints can be found in the top right corner of the screen
  • Your cursor might come in handy!

Controls:

  • Move: WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Pause: ESC

Team:

  • Programming: Nelson L.
  • Design/Sounds: Michael P.
